# Import packages

```{python}
#| import: load_packages

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from numba import jit
```

all functions are in: "notebooks/gsc_model_functions.py"

```{python}
#| label: import_functions

import gsc_model_functions as gmf
```

```{python}
#| label: fig-prob_detection
#| fig-cap: Probability per day of detecting the tumour for given tumour density.
#| fig-alt: plot

from gsc_model_params import lam,detect_threshold,death_threshold,detection_sensitivity,death_sensitivity

N = np.linspace(0,1,101)

kobe = gmf.detection_death(detect_threshold, N, detection_sensitivity, lam)
kobe_death = gmf.detection_death(death_threshold, N, death_sensitivity, lam)
plt.plot(N,kobe)
plt.plot(N,kobe_death)
plt.xlabel("Tumour size", fontsize=14)
plt.ylabel("Probability per day", fontsize=14)
#plt.title("Probablity of detecting tumour per day", fontsize=14)
plt.legend(["Detect", "Death"], fontsize=14)
plt.xticks(fontsize=14)
plt.yticks(fontsize=14)
plt.tight_layout()
#plt.savefig("../SMB_figs/detection_death.svg")
plt.savefig("../Manuscript/images/png/detect_death.png")
plt.show()
```
